content:
I just noticed that this is the description for Diagnostic Implication in our IG. Does this description make sense to folks, or should it be revised/clarified?
"Finding of whether a particular genotype/haplotype/variation or combination-thereof provides evidence for or against a particular type of cancer or the effectiveness of different interventions."
Great catch! That's the description to our old somatic implication. I'm sure we have a proper one we can update it to as a typo correction.
@Jamie Jones Do we need to create a Jira ticket for this, or was it already addressed. It a Jira is needed, let me know and also let me know of any specific "tags" I should include
